text: Carlos Enrique Verdejo Verdejo (2 October 1934 - 24 January 2017) was a Chilean footballer. He played as a forward. He played for Everton de Viña del Mar, Deportes La Serena, Santiago Wanderers and Palestino. Verdejo was born in Valparaíso. He died in Viña del Mar at the age of 82. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Deportes La Serena * Segunda División: 1957 * Copa Chile: 1960 ===Individual=== * Campeonato Nacional (Chile) Top-Scorer: 1958 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Chilean footballers
title: Carlos Verdejo
